messageBody: Hey, I saw on your profile that you enjoy golfing! What's your favorite course to play at?
Hi there, I couldn't help but notice your interest in romance novels. Do you have any favorites that you would recommend?
Hello, I'm new to the area and was wondering if you had any recommendations for a good place to golf around here?
Hey, I'm trying to get more into golfing and was wondering if you had any tips for a beginner?
Hi, I see that you enjoy reading romance novels! What do you think of the 'Outlander' series?
Hello, I'm looking for a new golf buddy. Would you be interested in playing a round sometime?
Hey there, I'm curious - do you prefer playing on public or private golf courses?
Hey, I noticed we both enjoy hiking. Have you been to any great trails lately?
Hi, I see you're a fan of cooking. What's your go-to recipe when you're in the mood for something comforting?
Hello, I'm new to the city and I'm wondering if you have any recommendations for a good place to grab a drink?
Hey, I see you enjoy running. Do you have any tips for staying motivated during a long race?
Hi there, I'm trying to get more into yoga. Do you have any favorite online classes you would recommend?
Hello, I see you're interested in history. What's your favorite time period to learn about?
Hey, I noticed we both enjoy photography. What's your favorite subject to shoot?
Hi, I see you're a fan of music. What's your favorite concert you've ever been to?
Hello, I'm trying to get more into meditation. Do you have any tips for beginners?
Hey there, I see you enjoy painting. What's your favorite medium to work with?
Hi there, I noticed we both love animals. Do you have any pets of your own?
Hello, I'm new to town and I'm wondering if you have any favorite restaurants in the area?
Hey, I see you enjoy travel. What's the most adventurous trip you've ever been on?
Hi, I see you're interested in astrology. What's your zodiac sign and do you think it accurately represents you?
Hello, I'm trying to get more into painting. Do you have any tips for beginners?
Hey there, I noticed we both enjoy watching movies. What's your favorite movie of all time?
Hi, I see you're a fan of sports. What's your favorite team and why?
Hello, I'm new to the gym and I'm wondering if you have any tips for getting in shape?
Hey, I see you enjoy cooking. What's your go-to recipe when you're in the mood for something spicy?
Hi there, I noticed we both enjoy reading. What's your favorite book and why?
